text: Napoleon is a 1994 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Saji, starring Babu Antony,Vijayakumar and Maathu in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Babu Antony as Abu Salim *Vijayakumar as Manu * Maathu as Geetha Manu * Jagathy Sreekumar as Bhoominatthan * Rajan P Dev as CI Venkidachalam * Priya as Sindhu * Vijayaraghavan as SI Anand * Raveendran as Kitho *Bheeman Raghu as SI Surendran *Sainuddin as Charapara Prabhakaran *NF Varghese as SP *Thrissur Elsy as Geetha's mother *Jose Pellissery as Geetha's father *Thalapathy Dinesh as Gangster *Thesni Khan as Laila *Abu Salim as Rathnam *Kunchan as Narayanan Mashu *T. S. Krishnan as Krishna *Narayanankutty as Prisoner Kutty *Kaladi Omana as Abu's mother *Bindu Varappuzha as Shoshamma Uthu *Punnapra Appachan as Jailor *Kalabhavan Rahman as Vegetable seller ==References== Category:1994 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Napoleon (1994 film)
